thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 22 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Visteon Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.79

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Visteon Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.79
text:
Feb 22 (Reuters) - Visteon Corp:
* VISTEON REPORTS STRONG 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.79 * Q4 SALES $3.146 BILLION VERSUS $797 MILLION * Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.64 EXCLUDING ITEMS * QTRLY SALES FOR ELECTRONICS PRODUCT GROUP TOTALED $797 MILLION, A DECREASE OF $6 MILLION FROM Q4 2016
* ‍ ONGOING BACKLOG WAS $19.4 BILLION AS OF DEC. 31, 2017, UP FROM $16.5 BILLION AT END OF 2016, AN INCREASE OF 18 PERCENT​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
